content: गम्य {%<ab>pot. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Accessible, approachable. {@--2@} Intelligible, or easy to be comprehended. {@--3@} Intended, implied, meant. {@--4@} Suitable, desirable, fit; <ls>Y. 1. 64.</ls> {@--5@} Fit for cohabitation; दुर्जनगम्या नार्यः <ls>Pt. 1. 278</ls>; अभिकामां स्त्रियं यश्च गम्यां रहसि याचितः . नोपैति <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--6@} Curable (by a drug &c.); न गम्यो मंत्राणां <ls>Bh. 1. 89.</ls> --म्यः A man with whom a woman may have intercourse, a libidinous or voluptuous, man, lover, paramour; <ls>Dk. 41.</ls>
